data.feedback: Plan fully covers all 4 user-requested epics (Sharing UI, Goals UI, Native Integration, Real-Time Client) with 30 detailed stories. Architecture follows existing Clean Architecture + BLoC patterns. API routes and WebSocket events correctly match backend implementation. Minor observation: some platform configs already exist but this is non-blocking.
suggestions: Note to developers: AndroidManifest.xml and Info.plist already have health permissions configured - verify they exist rather than adding duplicates
Consider adding integration tests for WebSocket reconnection scenarios
